Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sol Parque San Antonio in Puerto de la Cruz, you'll be by the ocean and minutes from Taoro Park, and close to Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens. This 4-star hotel is convenient to Garden Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 260 air-conditioned guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby. Guests can catch a ride on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 4 km.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Puerto de la Cruz? This hotel has facilities measuring 5380 square feet (500 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is Noon

Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Taoro Park - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sitio Litre Garden - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Ermita de San Juan - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Plaza del Charco - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Garden Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Castillo San Felipe - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Mirador de La Paz - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Botanical Garden of La Orotava - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Lago Martianez Swimming Pools - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Loro Parque - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Casino Puerto de la Cruz - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Pueblo Chico - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Iberoamericano Art Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi

The preferred airport for Sol Parque San Antonio is Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFN-Tenerife North) - 21.7 km / 13.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
